metadata.title: Amine Sghir - AI Engineer & Data Specialist
metadata.description: Portfolio of Amine Sghir, AI Engineer & Data Specialist with 8+ years of experience in Python, LLM, Cloud and Backend. Expert in generative AI and data pipelines.

hero.title: AI Engineer & Data Specialist
hero.tagline: I design generative AI solutions and cloud data architectures, from Python development to LLMs and real-time pipelines.

title.line2: one line of code at a time

description.p1: AI & Data Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I design intelligent LLM-based systems, cloud data pipelines and high-performance Python backends.
description.p2: Specialized in generative AI and distributed architectures, I founded 3 SaaS products and helped numerous companies in their data-driven transformation. My expertise also covers full-stack web development.

ai.title: Generative AI & LLM
ai.description: Design of LLM-based applications (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini). RAG expertise, advanced prompting and autonomous agents.

data.title: Data & Cloud Engineering
data.description: Robust data pipelines on AWS and Azure. Python, Kafka, Spark, and large-scale real-time processing.

fullstack.title: Backend & Full Stack
fullstack.description: High-performance APIs with Django and FastAPI. Modern web applications with Next.js when the project requires it.

skills.subtitle: Python and generative AI expert, from data engineering to cloud architectures, with solid full-stack experience.

experience.subtitle: 8+ years of experience in AI, data engineering, Python and cloud architectures.

sodexo.title: Tech Lead & AI Engineer
sodexo.description: Architecture and development of an LLM-based AI platform for intelligent data extraction from supplier documents. Python/Celery pipeline for async processing, Azure ML integration and automated extraction agents.

engie_gems.title: Senior Data Engineer
engie_gems.description: Cloud data pipeline architecture (Azure, AWS) with CI/CD orchestration. Development of reusable Python libraries. Time series management system for energy trading.

klaimy.title: Senior AI & Backend Engineer
klaimy.description: From-scratch design of Python backend API (Django) with queue system for async AI processing. ML model integration and Azure cloud deployment.

openclassrooms.title: Python & Data Mentor
openclassrooms.description: Mentoring on Python Developer and Data Analyst tracks. Technical guidance in Python, data science and development best practices.

engie_mastermind.title: Tech Lead / Data Engineer
engie_mastermind.description: Serverless ETL architecture on AWS (S3, Glue, Lambda) and C3.ai platform. Large-scale Linky/Gazpar data processing. Splunk/Grafana monitoring.

credit_agricole.title: Senior Data Engineer
credit_agricole.description: Data pipeline development on Dataiku with Python. Code refactoring and industrialization. Implementation of data development standards.

visian.title: Manager → Senior Consultant
visian.description: 5+ years of data and digital transformation consulting. Evolution from Data Consultant to Manager. Team management and strategic data project leadership.

projects.subtitle: Products I designed and developed as founder or technical co-founder.

takemykeys.title: Take My Keys
takemykeys.description: Concierge and rental management platform. Listing publication, guest welcome, reservation management and rent collection.

locary.title: Locary
locary.description: Real estate rental management SaaS with automation and AI. Bank synchronization, receipt generation, automatic reminders.

judia.title: Judia
judia.description: Intelligent AI email assistant. Automatic organization, spam/fraud detection, response writing assistance. 100% free.

contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how I can help you make it happen.

openTo.title: Open To
openTo.freelance: Freelance AI, Data Engineering & Python missions
openTo.collab: Innovative generative AI and LLM projects
